com.objetdirect.tatami.client.grid
Class GridLayout

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.grid.GridLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConvertibleToJSObject
public class GridLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConvertibleToJSObject

This class represents a Grid layout. It is composed of GridView, and has an optional rowbar to permit user to select a whole row without selecting a particular cell

Author:
rdunklau
